price: "E quanto a quem crê e faz o bem, terá como paga, a mais bela recompensa. E dir-lhe-emos o que for fácil de nossas ordens."
arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلَهُۥ جَزَآءً ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۖ وَسَنَقُولُ لَهُۥ مِنۡ أَمۡرِنَا يُسۡرٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā man āmana waʿamila ṣāliḥan falahu jazāan al-ḥus'nā wasanaqūlu lahu min amrinā yus'ran
